name: Villa Rauter
description:
Villa Rauter offers 2 holiday apartments in a quiet but central position. About 900 m. from the centre and the bottomstation of the Penkencable car. Great view: Ahorn, Penken and the ziller alps. Indoor tennis, approx. 300 m., swimmingpool 600 m. Ski- and skibootsdryer room, parking facilities, breadroll service.
Both apartments are in traditional and cosy style furnished. Per apartment: 2 Televisions.
- You can make use of the swimmingpool (in- and outdoor) possiblities of the Hotel Neuhaus.
Halfboard on request possible in hotel Neuhaus.
On request it is possible to book the apartments incl. halfboard (in the hotel Neuhaus).

Mayrhofen: at the roundabound turn left into the direction of the BP petrol station - turn right - turn left and pass the Europahaus/Tourist information - about 300 m. straight ahead, pass App.Hotel Thalerhof - and you will find our house on the right hand.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Holiday apartement: 4-Bedroom apartment, 90 sq.m. Lobby, kitchen with diner/large seating area (fully equipped with dishwasher, coffee machine). Bedroom with double bed and doublebed-couch with shower and washbasin in the room. 2 Televisions. Twinbedroom. Bedroom with bunkbed and washbasin. Sep. Bathrom with bath tube, shower, toilet and washbasin. Garden.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Holiday apartment - Top 2: 4-Bedroom apartment/ 90 sq.m. Lobby, kitchen diner (fully equipped with dishwasher, coffee machine) with seating area. Doublebedroom with extra bunkbed and couch with TV. Double room with Bath tube/Toilet and small kitchen. Doublebedroom. 2x large balcony. Extra bathroom with shower/washbasin, toilet seperatly.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet
makesOffer.description: Our apartment has 3 bedrooms ( 1 double-, 1 twin-and 1 singleroom), 2 bathrooms, 1 large living room, large east balcony, breakfast can be booked at the hotel Neuhaus
